title: Social Learning-Based Entrepreneurship Training Program Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Entrepreneurship Concepts and Small-Scale Business Experience
context.additional_context: Strengthened social interaction through learning community activities, VR simulation-based real startup environment experiences, and practice-oriented training utilizing current practitioners’ expertise

learning_goals: Learners apply entrepreneurial problem-solving strategies in VR simulations with ≥80% accuracy
Learners revise business plans to 90% completion based on peer feedback
Learners develop ≥3 networking strategies and create action plans through learning community activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
